website_summaries.verdict: Organic and basic rice cereal with fewer ingredients than some competing brands. A good pick for baby's first cereal.
pros: Contains only three ingredients – whole grain brown rice flour, iron, and vitamin E. Good for sensitive tummies
cons: A few consumers report spilled or broken boxes upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Found Bugs in one of the cereal!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cereal and bought some to share with my friends.The most important reason I chose this is that it is organic, but until now watching a bug coming out and in, that is too Organic for everyone I think! Although I only found out one box has bugs in it, but I don't know if I should finish the rest because they all look the same with large power leak and a gap between the cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While this is excellent rice cereal and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: While this is excellent rice cereal and my daughter loves it, I have to give a 1 star review because the expiration date that is posted on the box I ordered was March 3, 2017. This is extremely frustrating because I bought a pack of 12 and clearly there is no way my 6 month old is going to eat 12 boxes of rice cereal in one month. PLEASE POST the expiration date of your product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHOLE GRAIN - changed recipe!
customer_reviews.text: The case that the 12 cartons came in said "Whole Grain Baby Cereal" on it, but actual cartons say "Rice Cereal," not "Whole Grain Rice Cereal" as pictured. This is not a packaging change; this is an ingredients change. While the product description and carton pictured show "Whole Grain Rice Cereal," the cartons delivered were NOT the whole grain version. "WHOLE GRAIN ORGANIC RICE FLOUR" is supposed to be the #1 ingredient. It's not even listed. I went to Earth's Best website and they no longer have the whole grain version on their product list. Looks like they don't make it anymore. The product description and photos need to be updated to show this change.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE unpleasant ODOR in last few batches
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering countless times ( over 5 years now). A couple of last batches came with unpleasant odor. I didn't feel it was save to give it to my kids. Had to throw away ((( actually both rice and oatmeal. Looking for another alternative now. So disappointed since I love the idea of organic cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The worst thing I bought from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Received the pack on 12/31/2016 and the expiration date is 20/01/2017, how could a baby digest 12 boxes within 21 days? Additionally, most boxes are tainted, the internal packages seems crack and the power come out. I will definitely return all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product by the end of January 2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product by the end of January 2017 and the expiration date is 02 March of 2017. There are 12 boxes. My baby definitely can not finish all of them before they get expire.
customer_reviews.author: En Anne

customer_reviews.title: Too short expiration date! I got this product on ...
customer_reviews.text: Too short expiration date! I got this product on 16 JAN 2017, but the expired time is 20 JAN 2017!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really don't recommend to buy this product online because the package is ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received the products, all of them were broken. I really don't recommend to buy this product online because the package is very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: There was little brown chunks- I thought they might have been bugs at 1st. I’m still not certain what they were. I retuned it.
customer_reviews.author: A.g.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received the whole box on Dec 27, 2016, which shows the sign "BEST WHEN USED BY: 20 JAN 17"!!!
customer_reviews.author: YUN SHI

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: While likely very rare my son developed pretty severe hives from this product. We introduced food slowly a few days apart but it took 2-3 days for the hives to develop, eventually they covered his entire body and lasted for about 3 days. I read a lot of the reviews here and only found one other instance of someone reporting hives so again I do believe it's very rare but I would advise caution when trying new foods like this and instead of 4 days between new foods maybe wait a little longer if trying rice cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't order!
customer_reviews.text: I received cereal that expires a month from the date I received it. I will have to throw a bunch away. So irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda p.

customer_reviews.title: Smartest purchase I’ve made in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Because this cannot be beat. Just knowing my son is getting Quality in organic food makes me feel so good. The shipping was very fast in the price was even better I highly recommend purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of two boys

customer_reviews.title: Can I apply for return?The period of validity is June 2019,
customer_reviews.text: The period of validity is June 2019. My baby was born only next Tuesday, and rice noodles can be eaten only after 6 months. Can I apply for return? It's too short time to add supplementary food for me.
customer_reviews.author: HUANG TIAN

customer_reviews.title: Not sent item pictured
customer_reviews.text: I should have read previous reviews... I did not get what I thought I ordered. I ordered this brand specifically because I wanted brown rice flour plus the added vitamins. not at all what I got. the only ingredients listed on what i ordered are: organic rice flour, alpha amylase (enzyme), tocopherols (vitamin E), electrolyte iron. please refund this item to me!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out the Expire Date
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and ordered one. But it comes with only 4 months left to use. 12 boxes need to be used within 4 months is tough for us. So returned it. Please watch out the expire date of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Buying in bulk
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this cereal! I ordered an entire case. My only criticism is that it was ordered and delivered in the middle of May however the entire case expires in the middle of August. So I don’t have a long time for my baby to eat it before it expires.
customer_reviews.author: Valkyrie13

customer_reviews.title: The product expiration
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how old this cereal was/is. It definitely looks different from a fresher box purchased from the store. I don't feel comfortable feeding my child such a poor quality of food. I would not have purchased if known. I read the reviews after purchased and realized how common it was.
customer_reviews.author: Taurus Sanders

customer_reviews.title: “Love it”
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves it. It’s a good addition to the formula.Since I started using this product with the milk my little one has less gassy moments
customer_reviews.author: LSETAL

customer_reviews.title: Almost expire in 1 week and it’s fake
customer_reviews.text: Previously we bought it from Target and my baby really loved it. Then I bought from Amazon, they’re going to expire in a week and what’s more, my baby seems like to vomit when eat the cereal from Amazon, but eats the one from Target quite well. When I compare them side by side, I found larger gray particles in Cereal from Amazon(right side of the picture), while the one from Target is homogeneous powder. So, it looks like a fake one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gift this time. My children used to eat this brand of rice cereal before. I feel relieved and full of nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Its so easy to make
customer_reviews.text: Its so easy to make, takes 2 minutes. I’ve been giving this cerel to my baby since she was less than 12 months. Its easily digestibleand we mix it with different ingredients (berries, banana, cheese, butter) to make a different breakfast each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my baby needs
customer_reviews.text: We go through a lot of this because of our little being diagnosed with Dysphagia. This works great, and doesn’t have any unnecessary additives!
customer_reviews.author: Cha & Heady

customer_reviews.title: Should stop selling to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had known about the arsenic contamination problem in this product earlier. Bought 12 boxes because of the good reviews, then found out it damages my baby’s brains,
customer_reviews.author: I Jane Chen

customer_reviews.title: Old stock, short use by date
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these thinking the cereals are usually good for 6 months to a year. These 12 boxes expire in 3 months!!! Use by 2/2020. That's ridiculous. They should warn you they have old stock.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Mold inside box
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrable!!! Don’t feed your baby with this!!! There are a many small mold particles on the paper box and the cereal taste bitter. The rice cereal is directly in the paper box and the paper box is only covered by a very thin layer of plastic. This package cannot keep cereal from the outside humide and spore. Do not buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Xi C.

customer_reviews.title: Good organic choice for a first cereal
customer_reviews.text: We like this product because it is organic and my daughter likes the taste. She ate this quite a bit when she first started eating solids and we still use it occasionally as 'oatmeal' for her breakfast at 2 years old. The only issue we've found is that sometimes it clumps. I'm not sure if it is from the humidity in the house, but we just break up the clumps and it is still fine to eat.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom in CT

customer_reviews.title: Another quality Earth's Best product
customer_reviews.text: Mixing into baby's formula without issues. Great suspension and consistency is great when mixing as puree for the older one.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix7!

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date is way to short
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 12 pack at Mar 22 and the expiration date is Jul 31. It is way too short for my baby to consume all the them. Amazon should force the seller to expose the expiration date information as a requirement for bulk sell of food.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: I got a pack of 12 of these boxes, and the expiration date on all of them was only 6 weeks from the date of purchase. There's no way I can go through this many so this was a wasted purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: EXPIRATION DATE TOO SHORT bought this product Feb 5,2017 and the 12 boxes of rice cereal will expire on March 2, 2017.

customer_reviews.title: No spills
customer_reviews.text: Good pricing and quality- all boxes were in tact and no spills

customer_reviews.title: Good deal

customer_reviews.title: Great item for babies

We believe in organic, especially in our babies so this works well. Brand was recommended and price is excellent. I bought the 12 pack thinking that this was too much quantity. Man my babies can eat. I am running out faster than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Arguello Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the only rice cereal we use for my son. He has had bad acid reflux and of course needs cereal in every bottle so we go through a good bit. After comparing proces, this is the cheapest we have found. Though only pennies in difference, you cant beat the fact that it is free shipping and comes straight to your door.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: The best baby food

customer_reviews.author: hms142002

customer_reviews.title: It makes a great thickener for fruit and vegetable purees
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (almost a year old) loves this stuff. It makes a great thickener for fruit and vegetable purees, or on its own. Surprisingly, it's one of the few things that's cheaper here on Amazon than in any store near us, almost by half!
customer_reviews.author: A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Better than white flour..
customer_reviews.text: We use this for thickening gravy and sauce instead of white flour. ..Doesn't need to be cooked to boiling like flour, can be added a bit later, and is so convenient.. Still best to blend before the boiling point to avoid lumps, but we still prefer it to flour.

customer_reviews.title: too much iron?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe is my fault for not thinking in the mix, but if you are feeding your baby formula, there is a big chance that is iron fortify, well this cereal is also iron fortify so your little one will be constipated and in pain. I am giving it another try to see if my babies get use to it. other than that, kids love it.

So I will suggest please be cautious when someone else also want to purchase it just because of its extremely low price.

After my one year old son ate, he became very hyper and keeping running circle in the house. I am not sure is this new formula? why don't they update the website picture, or I won't order it here. Now they are going to replace same products as website to me.

product_meta.title: Earth's Best Organic Infant Cereal, Whole Grain Rice, 8 oz. Box (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description:
Earth's Best Organic Infant Cereals are a nutritious first food for your little one as they transition to solids. Our nourishing cereals are made with whole grains and iron fortified for infant growth and development. All Earth’s Best cereals are USDA-Certified Organic, made with non-GMO ingredients, and contain no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. They are also unsweetened, unsalted, and have no added modified starches. From the day that Earth’s Best was founded in 1985, we’ve been recognized as a brand dedicated to offering wholesome, safe products for little ones. We believe that babies deserve nutritious fruits handpicked from organic orchards, vegetables grown in nature’s soil, and foods that are made without genetically engineered ingredients. Offering a wide range of safe and gentle baby care products as well as nourishing foods, Earth's Best products are created with care, using simple ingredients found in nature. Made with love from the ground up, you can trust Earth’s Best products to be safe for your baby.

AMAZON.COM





Earth's Best Organic Foods


Organic foods offer countless healthful benefits for you, your children and the world around us. With The Hain Celestial Group's family of organic brands and Earth's Best you can be sure you are giving your family the highest quality organic foods.
Earth's Best For Infants



From the day they are born, infants rapidly change and grow. And so do their food preferences. That's why Earth's Best offers a wide variety of formulas, cereals, jarred food blends and juices to ensure your baby gets the wholesome and pure nutrition they need. 

 Earth's Best Organic Whole Grain Rice Cereal


Organic... Pure... Delicious. Give your baby a healthy start on life with Earth’s Best. Earth’s Best is the only full line of organic baby food and it is the first brand of baby food to be produced with NO Genetically Engineered Ingredients. Earth’s Best infant cereals and jarred foods are available in over 40 varieties, along with infant juices and teething biscuits to satisfy the taste and texture of babies four months and up.
Why Organic?

Choosing organic is choosing to live a healthier life. Organic foods are produced without the use of potentially harmful chemicals and synthetic pesticides or growth hormones. This is even more important when we consider infants. For four to six months following birth, infants receive most of their nutrition from breast milk or infant formula. It is so important that these formulas contain the safest ingredients.

If ingested, potential toxic chemicals or heavy metals can lead to compromised immune system development. Likewise, young infants consume disproportionately high levels of fruits and vegetables when compared to adults. This increases their risk of exposure to potential contaminants found among non-organic products. Finally, Earth's Best products do not contain genetically engineered ingredients (GEIs), made by inserting genes from one plant into a strain of another to produce more crops or control pests.

Why organic? It is better for you, your child and the environment they will grow up in.

The Earth's Best Difference:
 * Organic ingredients grown without harmful pesticides
 * No Genetically Engineered Ingredients (GEIs)
 * Most items made only from whole grains
 * No added salt, modified starches or refined sugars
 * No artificial flavors, colors or preservatives
 * Kosher (excluding meat varieties)
 * Rigorous product testing
   

As your little one grows, you'll have to make a lot of choices. With Earth's Best choosing the right food is easy. They create high quality, organic products grown by the some of the best farmers, filled with the best ingredients and tested for the highest level of purity and freshness. Earth's Best organic products help protect the earth so future generations have healthy food to eat and a healthy world to grow up in. That makes a big difference for your little one.


About Earth’s Best


Earth’s Best is the first and only full line of organic baby food. Earth's Best organic provides "better for baby" products with the freshest, purest ingredients, so parents can nurture their baby's health with the utmost confidence. Earth’s Best is organic certified by Oregon Tilth, an agency accredited by the USDA. That means they procure ingredients that do not contain potentially harmful synthetic pesticides, herbicides, fertilizers, or genetically engineered ingredients (GEIs). It also means that they can proudly display the USDA organic logo on their packaging.

No wonder, Earth’s Best has been trusted and preferred by parents, grandparents, and caregivers alike for the past 25 years.

Today Earth’s Best offers organic formulas, snacks, meals, and even baby body products for your little one. By expanding the trusted Earth's Best brand beyond baby foods they hope all children will grow up with the freshest and purest products possible in a clean and safe world.

Earth's Best Quality Promise


Earth's Best produces food with the highest degree of attention to quality and safety.

Each ingredient is tested for pesticides and potentially harmful residues. No product is released until Earth's Best quality assurance department approves laboratory results, ensuring they meet the strict standards for organic certification.  * Earth's Best organic infant formula contains no toxic chemicals or heavy metals.
   
 * Earth's Best organic infant cereals provide an excellent source of iron to aid early physical and neurological development and restore the iron depletion that results after birth.
 * Earth's Best organic baby juice comes from fresh pressed, undiluted, single strength juice, not from concentrate.
   
 * Earth's Best organic produce does not expose infants to the higher level of contaminants found in conventional produce. Proportionately, babies consume up to four times the fruits and vegetables that adults consume.
 * Earth's Best organic jarred fruits provide an excellent source of vitamin C to aid the absorption of iron and help fight infections.




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Earth’s Best Organic Whole Grain Infant Cereals are available with and without fruit. They have 35-45% Daily Value of Iron for infants are flavorful and contain vitamins, minerals and dietary fiber. The cereals are made with and organically grown whole grains and do not contain salt, refined sugar or preservatives. Earth’s Best Organic infant cereal and jarred foods are available in more than 60 varieties, along with infant juices and teething biscuits, to satisfy the taste and texture preferences of babies four months and up. Additionally, though breast milk is the first choice for an infant’s growth and development, Earth’s Best Organic provides organic infant formulas that contain essential nutrients babies require.
